message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I believe a starting price of $15,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $13,500. This is a very competitive price for a product of this caliber.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
